Body.Content:
We are announcing the availability of security scan recommendations in Security Hub for Power Pages. This feature will reach general availability on November 28, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature helps admins enhance security by identifying sites where security scans are not running. It improves visibility through centralized insights into security scan coverage across environments, and it streamlines security actions by providing one-click options to trigger scans or share recommendations with site owners.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

Title: Power Pages - Security scan recommendations in Security Hub
